description:
Cover your ears in wind protection and fleecy warmth. The low profile design can be worn by itself or underneath a helmet or hat.

  • Wind-resistant earband with N98 Active fleece lining for warmth
  • Laser cut holes around the ears and side slit for eyewear
  • Stretch back panel for a snug fit
  • Lycra binding for snug fit
  • One size fits most heads
name: CTR Howler Bando Headband - Unisex
